name: Helge Hagenauer
content: Home Page of Helge Hagenauer Universität Salzburg FB Computerwissenschaften     Computer Science Studies     Current Teaching Helge Hagenauer Ao.Univ.Prof. Mag.Dr. Research Interests Simulation: simulation methods, parallel and distributed simulation Software Engineering: object-oriented-methods, design patterns Programming: concurrent programming, Ada, Java List of recent publications and activities Teaching See my teaching page (in German). Administration Head of the responsible commission for the Computer Science studies in Salzburg Coordinator of the Computer Science teaching programm Short CV 1987 master's degree in mathematics, University of Salzburg 1987 - 1992 scientific assistant at the department of Mathematics and the Research Institute of Software Technologies, University of Salzburg 1992 PhD in natural sciences (mathematics), University of Salzburg 1992 - 2001 assistant at the department "Computerwissenschaften und Systemanalyse" (Computer Science and System Analysis) since 2001 associate professor for computer science, University of Salzburg Addresses Email hagenau@cosy.sbg.ac.at Snail mail Helge HagenauerFB ComputerwissenschaftenUniversität SalzburgJakob-Haringer-Str. 25020 SalzburgAUSTRIA
